sentences: Olli Herman Kosunen (born 19 May 1983 in Kuopio, Finland), also known as H. Olliver Twisted is a Finnish singer who has played in the Swedish glam metal band Crashdïet.
Twisted is currently a member of the Finnish glam metal band, Reckless Love.
In 2007 he joined the Swedish hard rock band Crashdïet, to replace their former singer Dave Lepard; who died in January of the previous year.
Twisted married his girlfriend Noora Niemelä on 11 February 2012 in Tampere, Finland.
On 9 February 2017, he confirmed that day's headlines in the Finnish press about him and Noora Niemelä getting divorced.
